sentences.sContent: As everyone expected ted's chimerical scheme to make a fortune by raising ermines in his backyard proved a dismal failure.
sentences.sContent_eng: As everyone expected ted's chimerical scheme to make a fortune by raising ermines in his backyard proved a dismal failure.
sentences.sCn: 不出大家所料，泰德想在后院饲养白鼬来发财的荒诞不经的计划以惨败告终。

remMethod.val: 很多化学 (chemical) 物质是他空想的 (chimerical)

words.tran: [遗] 嵌合体；虚构的怪物；妄想
